text: Gumazir biziba bar da apim, gumazir asɨziba apir puvatɨzim girakɨrangɨn adarir nɨghnɨzibar gumazir kam damuan markɨ. Eghtɨ uaghan gumazir asɨziba apir puvatɨzim, a fo, God a inizɨ a siosɨn aven ize, kamaghɨn, a gumazir biziba bar da apimɨn arazibar gan da tuisɨghan markɨ egh suam, an araziba ikufi.
